name: Dungonian: Epic card brawler
description:
Join us in https://www.reddit.com/r/Dungonian/

Try to survive in the most dangerous dungeon. 
Use your intellect to move correctly, get all the treasures, kill your enemies and be the number 1 in the ranking.

Dungonian will surprise you with:

- 7 different heroes with their own abilities.
- More than 11 type of monsters to fight you
- More than 10 weapons to slash all you can see and perform your strategy
- Amazing music
- Daily, weekendly and monthly ranking
